title: Snowflake Gives Weak Profit Margin Outlook, Fueling AI Cost Fear
description: Snowflake Inc. gave an outlook for operating margin that fell short of analysts’ estimates, raising concerns among investors about the profitability of new AI-based tools.

title: Roblox Service in Russia Is Shut Down, Local Outlets Say
description: Roblox Corp.’s popular gaming platform was blocked in Russia, local news outlets reported, cutting off millions of daily users.

title: Apple Design Executive Alan Dye Poached by Meta in Major Coup
description: Meta Platforms Inc. has poached Apple Inc.’s most prominent design executive in a major coup that underscores a push by the social networking giant into AI-equipped consumer devices.
